description: This file defines the PlayerRepository class which manages an ExoPlayer instance for media playback in an Android application. It provides methods to initialize, set media, and release the player.

classes.name: PlayerRepository
classes.description: A repository class that manages an ExoPlayer instance, providing initialization, media setting, and resource release functionalities.

methods.name: player
methods.description: Getter for the ExoPlayer instance; initializes the player if it hasn't been created yet.

methods.name: setMediaUri
methods.description: Sets the media Uri for the player and prepares it for playback.

methods.name: release
methods.description: Releases the ExoPlayer resources and resets the player instance.
